name: Kingdom Of Nerea: Dark Ages
description:
Some Zeldish/Pokemon RPG done for the GBJam.

The game is actually a small prototype that is being developing now to do a full one with all the features. Hope you enjoy it.

*NEW* - Free Game Assets!

How i not go to continue with the game development and people seems like the style/game i decided share free the assets to give the people the chance to create his own RPG game.

You can find in the downloads a new one called "KingdomNerea_free_assets.zip" there you can find all the assets of the game and also "kingdom_of_nerea_CC0.zip" the Construct2 code all with CC0 license. Enjoy!

To be updated you can follow me at Twitter,
